# destinationRGBBlendFactor

**Instance Property**

Configures the destination RGB blend factor.

## Declaration

```swift
var destinationRGBBlendFactor: MTLBlendFactor { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property defaults to `MTLBlendFactorZero`.
title: destinationRGBBlendFactor
